Name: Murder at Midnight
About the game: Murder at Midnight is an exciting game of investigation and deceit! You can play with anywhere from 4 to 15 players with a mouse and keyboard. At the beginning of a game, between 1 and 3 players will become predators, depending on your game settings, and the rest will become prey. The prey have to do their best to either complete all of their objectives or figure out and vote off the predators before they can be hunted down. Your roles and objectives will change with every round leading to a fun new experience with every game!
